title: 04/28/2021 - HOUR 3 - Bridgewater Traded, Jordan Palmer, Andy Ruiz
itunes:title: 04/28/2021 - HOUR 3 - Bridgewater Traded, Jordan Palmer, Andy Ruiz
description:
Colin reacts to Teddy Bridgewater being traded to the Denver Broncos and explains how it will change the draft. Jordan Palmer shares his thoughts on the Bridgewater trade and if Justin Field or Trey Lance will be a fit for the Patriots. And Andy Ruiz joins the show to discuss his upcoming fight with Chris Arreola.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
